title: november 6: ball in a basket
description:
Today on 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia goes back to the 1800’s, when James Naismith was born and subsequently invented basketball. (With a few years in between, of course.) Afterwards, she talks about an iconic Madonna show. Join this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
